param.name: publ
param.label: Published?
param.description: Published? (Only for Joomla 1.5 to remove tag)

param.name: debug
param.label: Debug?
param.description: Debug the plugin and show log-comments?

param.name: plugincode
param.label: Plugin code
param.description: The code which is used to be placed in the article between {} to trigger plugin. Default mosmap.

param.name: brackets
param.label: Brackets
param.description: What brackets should be use aroudn the plugin code: {} (default with [] for multiple kml), [] (with () for multiple kml) or both (() for multiple kml. [] will give problems with multiple kml)

param.name: Google_API_version
param.label: Google API version
param.description: The version of the Google API that has to be used (2.x latest version, 2.s stable version and 2.number with number a specific version, like 2.76).

param.name: loadmootools
param.label: Load with mootools?
param.description: If mootools (default) should be used to load the map or a timeinterval?

param.name: timeinterval
param.label: Timeinterval
param.description: To show the map a timeinterval in ms is done to wait for the page is loaded correctly (default 500ms). Especially for IE this can prevent a fatal error.

param.name: Google_API_key
param.label: Google API key
param.description: The key that's needed for using the Google API. Leave blank for multi website below.

param.name: Google_Multi_API_key
param.label: Google Multi API key
param.description: For a number of website needs different keys. Enter website;key for each website on new line

param.name: urlsetting
param.label: URL variable
param.description: Use HTTP_HOST or Joomla config setting (1.0.x mosConfig_live_site/1.5.x)?

param.name: googlewebsite
param.label: Google website
param.description: What google website should be used for geocoding and directions

param.name: googleindexing
param.label: Google indexing?
param.description: If google may index your map and markers (default Yes)

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the map. You must put the units behind the number like 100% or 400px

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the map. You must put the units behind the number like 100% or 400px

param.name: lat
param.label: Latitude
param.description: Lattitude for the default place

param.name: lon
param.label: Longitude
param.description: Longitude for the default place

param.name: centerlat
param.label: Center latitude
param.description: Lattitude for the center of the map

param.name: centerlon
param.label: Center longitude
param.description: Longitude for the center of the map

param.name: address
param.label: Address
param.description: Address for the default place

param.name: zoom
param.label: Zoomlevel
param.description: The zoomlevel for the first view of the map

param.name: ovzoom
param.label: Overview zoomlevel
param.description: Correction for the zoomlevel of the overview. Difference from the zoomlevel of the map (-3 is default of google maps).

param.name: controlType
param.label: Control type
param.description: The type of controls can be automatic (Default User Interface maps.google.com) or user (define with parameters below).

param.name: zoomType
param.label: Zoomtype
param.description: The type of button for zoom on the map. Zoomtype can be Small, Large, 3D large, 3D Large with Streetview button, 3D small or None so there is no zoomcontrol.

param.name: rotation
param.label: Aerial Perspective Imagery
param.description: Show Aerial Perspective Imagery/Bird view when available

param.name: zoomNew
param.label: Doubleclick and Continues zoom
param.description: Give the use doubleclick zoom and smooth zooming?

param.name: zoomWheel
param.label: Mousewheel zoom
param.description: Zoom map with mousewheel?

param.name: keyboard
param.label: Keyboard support
param.description: Support for keyboard zoom and Pan.

param.name: mapType
param.label: Maptype
param.description: The first view of the map will be this type. Maptype can be Normal (default), Satellite, Hybrid, Terrain or Earth.

param.name: showMaptype
param.label: Show Maptype
param.description: Show the buttons for maptype?

param.name: showScale
param.label: Show Scale
param.description: Show the scale bar on the map?

param.name: overview
param.label: Overview
param.description: Show a small overview of the map in the lower right bottom corner

param.name: navlabel
param.label: Show Navlabel?
param.description: Show navigation label for a dynamic breadcrumb label indicating the address of the current view of the map

param.name: dragging
param.label: Dragging
param.description: If the map can pan and zoom (dragging)? If you want no dragging set overview off and zoomtype to none.

param.name: marker
param.label: Infowindow
param.description: If infowindow is open or closed initially?

param.name: icon
param.label: Url to icon
param.description: The url to a icon for the marker so it can be different then default of Google

param.name: iconwidth
param.label: Icon width
param.description: The width of a icon

param.name: iconheight
param.label: Icon Height
param.description: The height of a icon

param.name: iconshadow
param.label: Url to shadow
param.description: The url to a shadow of a icon

param.name: iconshadowwidth
param.label: Shadow width
param.description: The width of a shadow of a icon

param.name: iconshadowheight
param.label: Shadow height
param.description: The height of a shadow of a icon

param.name: iconshadowanchorx
param.label: Shadow anchor x
param.description: Anchor x of the shadow of the info window

param.name: iconshadowanchory
param.label: Shadow anchor y
param.description: Anchor y of the shadow of the info window

param.name: iconanchorx
param.label: Icon anchor x
param.description: Anchor x of the icon to pin point the exact coordinates

param.name: iconanchory
param.label: Icon anchor y
param.description: Anchor y of the icon to pin point the exact coordinates

param.name: iconinfoanchorx
param.label: Info anchor x
param.description: Anchor x of the infowindow

param.name: iconinfoanchory
param.label: Info anchor y
param.description: Anchor y of the infowindow

param.name: icontransparent
param.label: Url to transparent
param.description: The url to a transparant of icon (to make it clickable)

param.name: iconimagemap
param.label: Imagemap
param.description: The imagemap of a icon (to make it clickable)

param.name: dir
param.label: Directionsform
param.description: If in a infowindow the direction form is added and how to show it: new window/tab or in a lightbox?

param.name: dirtype
param.label: Direction type
param.description: If walking or driving directions should be shown (Driving default)

param.name: avoidhighways
param.label: Avoid highways
param.description: Attempt to exclude highways when computing directions. Note that directions may still include highways if there are no viable alternatives (default No)

param.name: showdir
param.label: Show directions
param.description: Show directions? (default Yes)

param.name: animdir
param.label: Animation of directions?
param.description: Show animations of directions with streetview, map and route information? (default No)

param.name: animspeed
param.label: Animation speed
param.description: Animation speed in seconds. Can be 0.5

param.name: animautostart
param.label: Autostart of Animation?
param.description: Start the animation directly after load? (default No)

param.name: animunit
param.label: Animation units
param.description: The units can be miles or kilometers (default)

param.name: formspeed
param.label: Form for speed
param.description: Show a form for the user to set the speed of the animation (default No)

param.name: formdirtype
param.label: Form for route type
param.description: Show a form for the user to set the type of directions for the animation (drive, walking and avoid highways) (default No)

param.name: formaddress
param.label: Form for address
param.description: Show a form for the user to set the start address and end address of the animation (default No)

param.name: langanim
param.default: en;The requested panorama could not be displayed\|Could not generate a route for the current start and end addresses\|Street View coverage is not available for this route\|You have reached your destination\|miles\|miles\|ft\|kilometers\|kilometer\|meters\|In\|You will reach your destination\|Stop\|Drive\|Press Drive to follow your route\|Route\|Speed\|Fast\|Medium\|Slow
param.label: Language animations
param.description: All the labels for animation

param.name: traffic
param.label: Traffic
param.description: If Traffic should be shown on the map (only USA currently)?

param.name: panoramio
param.label: Panoramio
param.description: If Panoramio photo's should be shown on the map?

param.name: panotype
param.label: Panoramio type
param.description: This is a different layer for panoramio then the previous. Here you can set a userid for own photo's or use public or full.

param.name: panoorder
param.label: Panoramio order
param.description: The order of the photo's retrieved

param.name: panomax
param.label: Panoramio max photo's
param.description: The maximum nimber of photo's shown on a map (max 100)

param.name: youtube
param.label: Youtube
param.description: If Youtube video's should be shown on the map?

param.name: wiki
param.label: Wiki
param.description: If wikipedia articles should be shown on the map (default none)? Use extension of country to select language. For example en for org.wikipedia.en

param.name: adsmanager
param.label: Ads Manager
param.description: Place ads of Google on the map

param.name: maxads
param.label: Maximum ads
param.description: Maximum ads on the map

param.name: localsearch
param.label: Local Search
param.description: If Local Search bar should be shown?

param.name: adsense
param.label: Adsense ID
param.description: The adsense ID like PUB-1234567890

param.name: channel
param.label: Adsense channel
param.description: The channel which has to be used for the advertisements

param.name: googlebar
param.label: Googlebar
param.description: If Googlebar should be shown?

param.name: searchlist
param.label: Searchlist type
param.description: This can be inline (Default), suppress, div (Searchresult will be below map) or a name of a div (with this option you have to place the div for result yourself in the article)

param.name: searchtarget
param.label: Search link target
param.description: The target for the links in the seacrh result

param.name: searchzoompan
param.label: Search pan&zoom
param.description: Pan and zoom to show results and show first result opened?

param.name: txtdir
param.label: Title directions
param.description: The title of the directions form

param.name: txtgetdir
param.label: Button directions
param.description: The text in the button of the directions form

param.name: txtfrom
param.label: Text from directions
param.description: The text for the from option in the directionsform. Empty removes the option from the form (default empty)

param.name: txtto
param.label: Text to directions
param.description: The text for the to option in the directionsform. Empty removes the option from the form (default empty)

param.name: txtdiraddr
param.label: Text label address
param.description: The text for the field with address in the directionsform

param.name: txt_driving
param.label: Text label driving
param.description: The text for the radio group item driving in the directionsform. Empty removes the option from the form (default empty)

param.name: txt_avhighways
param.label: Text label avoid highways
param.description: The text for the radio group item avoid highways in the directionsform. Empty removes the option from the form (default empty)

param.name: txt_walking
param.label: Text label walking
param.description: The text for the radio group item walking in the directionsform. Empty removes the option from the form (default empty)

param.name: dirdefault
param.label: From/To Default
param.description: If from or to has to be the default for directions

param.name: gotoaddr
param.label: Field gotoaddress
param.description: Show a searchfield and button so the user can search a address on the map

param.name: txtaddr
param.label: Address infowindow text
param.description: The text in the infowindow. Place ## where you want the entered address

param.name: erraddr
param.label: Address error text
param.description: The text in the alert box. Place ## where you want the entered address

param.name: clientgeotype
param.label: Client geocoding type
param.description: Should the normal geocoder be used or local search for finding addresses not found on server side.

param.name: align
param.label: Map align
param.description: Alignment of the map in the content

param.name: langtype
param.label: Language setting type
param.description: If the language should be determined from the site language, setting below or the user. Can be override as a parameter of plugin.

param.name: lang
param.label: Language
param.description: Language for the buttons on the map. leave blank for user language.

param.name: lightbox
param.label: Show Link Lightbox
param.description: Show a link to the lightbox

param.name: txtlightbox
param.label: Text lightbox link
param.description: The text for the link to open the lightbox

param.name: lbxwidth
param.label: Lightbox width
param.description: Width of the lightbox. You must put the units behind the number like 500px

param.name: lbxheight
param.label: Lightbox height
param.description: Height of the lightbox. You must put the units behind the number like 700px

param.name: effect
param.label: Effect on Map
param.description: What effect has to be used on the Map (Horizontal use absolute width!)

param.name: kmlrenderer
param.label: KML renderer
param.description: What renderer has to be used for kml, gpx etc.

param.name: kmlsidebar
param.label: KML Sidebar type
param.description: This can be none (Default), left, right or a name of a div (with this option you have to place the div for sidebar yourself in the article)

param.name: kmlsbwidth
param.label: KML Sidebar width
param.description: Width of the sidebar (default 200px). You must put the units behind the number like 100%, 400 or 400px

param.name: kmlfoldersopen
param.label: KML folders open
param.description: If folders in a kml-file should be default all opened or defined inside the kml file (default)

param.name: kmlopenmethod
param.label: KML infowindow event
param.description: If infowindo in a kml-file should react on a specific method (click is default)

param.name: kmlsbsort
param.label: Sort KML sidebar items
param.description: Sort the items in the KML sidebar (none, asc, desc)

param.name: kmllightbox
param.label: KML lightbox support
param.description: If the scripts for lichtbox should be loaded to support a lightbox as a link in a kml-file

param.name: kmlmessshow
param.label: Show KML render message
param.description: Show mesages for loading receiving etc (only for GeoXML)

param.name: kmlclickablemarkers
param.label: Show KML infowindow
param.description: Show infowindow on markers of a kml-file (only for GeoXML)

param.name: kmllinkablemarkers
param.label: Use marker as link
param.description: Click on a marker to goto a url (only for GeoXML)

param.name: kmllinktarget
param.label: Link target for marker
param.description: How to open a link on a marker (only for GeoXML)

param.name: kmllinkmethod
param.label: Marker link method
param.description: If link on a marker in a kml-file should react on a specific method (dblclick is default) (only for GeoXML)

param.name: proxy
param.label: Use proxy for kml
param.description: Get kml-files with proxy when using geoxml. If you don't use proxy then the kml-file should be on your own site.

param.name: sv
param.label: Streetview
param.description: This can be none (Default), top, bottom or a name of a div (with this option you have to place the div for streetview yourself in the article)

param.name: svwidth
param.label: Streetview width
param.description: Width of the streetview (default 100%). You must put the units behind the number like 100%, 400 or 400px. Minimum is 250px.

param.name: svheight
param.label: Streetview height
param.description: Height of the streetview (default 300). You must put the units behind the number like 100%, 400 or 400px. Minimum is 70px.

param.name: svyaw
param.label: Streetview yaw
param.description: Defines the rotation angle around the camera locus in degrees relative from true north (default 0 = North)

param.name: svpitch
param.label: Streetview pitch
param.description: Defines the angle variance up or down from the camera's initial default pitch (default 0 = horizontal)

param.name: svzoom
param.label: Streetview zoom
param.description: defines the zoom level of this view (default empty)

param.name: earthtimeout
param.label: Earth maptype timeout
param.description: Timeout for Earth maptype for next action's like lookat and camera view
